abstract: Lydia Ko takes third-round lead at Coates Golf Championship in Florida.
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko shot a seven-under-par 65 in the third round of the Coates Golf Championship in Ocala, Fla., to take the outright lead in the L.P.G.A. Tour’s season opener.
snippet: Lydia Ko shot a seven-under-par 65 in the third round of the Coates Golf Championship in Ocala, Fla., to take the outright lead in the L.P.G.A. Tour’s season opener.

headline.main: Ko Takes Lead in Florida at L.P.G.A. Event
